results.content: 请保持良好个人卫生。经常用水和肥皂洗手，避免触摸眼睛、鼻子和嘴巴。在咳嗽或打喷嚏时，请用纸巾或手肘遮盖嘴巴和鼻子。

phrase.content: Please maintain good personal hygiene. Wash your hands with soap and water frequently. Try not to touch your eyes, nose, and mouth. Always cover your mouth when coughing or sneezing.

results.romanized: qǐng bǎo chí liáng hǎo gè rén wèi shēng 。 jīng cháng yòng shǔi hé féi zào xǐ shǒu ， bì miǎn hóng mō yǎn jīng 、 bí zǐ hé zǔi bā 。 zài ké sòu huò dǎ pēn tì shí ， qǐng yòng zhǐ jīn huò shǒu zhǒu zhē gài zǔi bā hé bí zǐ 。

results.content: 请不要与他人共用食物、餐具或个人卫生用品。

phrase.content: Please prevent others from using your spoon, fork, plates, bowls, food. Also do not share personal hygiene items like your towel.

results.romanized: qǐng bù yào yǔ tā rén gòng yòng shí wù 、 cān jù huò gè rén wèi shēng yòng pǐn 。

results.content: 请继续服用医生给您开的药。

phrase.content: Continue to take the medications prescribed for you (if any).

results.romanized: Qǐng jì xù fú yòng yī shēng gěi nín kāi di yào.

phrase.content: Please drink a lot of water.

results.content: 请在家里继续测量体温，注意自己是否有症状

phrase.content: Keep monitoring your temperature and symptoms at home.

results.romanized: qǐng zài jiā lǐ jì xù cè liàng tǐ wēn ， zhù yì zì jǐ shì fǒu yǒu zhèng zhuàng
